generated.css: body{width:100vw;height:100vh;margin:0;padding:0;font:.8em 64px;grid-template-areas:"header" "cards" "footer"}.header{grid-area:header}.cards{grid-area:cards}.footer{grid-area:footer}.contain-img{-webkit-background-size:contain;background-size:contain}.transition{transition:opacity .15s ease-in-out;-moz-transition:opacity .15s ease-in-out;-webkit-transition:opacity .15s 2px 6px 0 rgba(197,186,186,.5)}.dropdown,.header{display:flex;background:#fff}.header{width:100%;height:92px;align-items:center;position:fixed;z-index:1;box-shadow:0 1px ease-in-out;-moz-transition:opacity .15s ease-in-out;-webkit-transition:opacity .15s ease-in-out}.footer__nav-item:hover{color:#333}.footer__logo{font-size:12px;letter-spacing:.01px;color:#858585}.cards{width:75%;margin:35px;justify-self:center}.cards__title{margin-bottom:32px;font-size:36px;font-weight:700;text-align:left}.cards__container{display:-ms-grid;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(4,1fr);grid-gap:20px}.card{display:flex;flex-direction:column;justify-content:space-between;flex-shrink:0;border-radius:20px;background:#f7f7f7;cursor:pointer}.card__content{padding:20px}.card__additional_content{border-radius:20px}.card__title{font-size:24px;font-weight:700}.card__source,.card__time{font-size:18px}.card__icon{width:24px;height:24px}.card__description{font-size:20px}.card_type_critical{background:#db5341}.card .image,.card__data .graph__icon{width:100%;height:19em;background:url(82e7074d27e06234f61495edc335f527.svg) no-repeat;-webkit-background-size:contain;background-size:contain;border-radius:20px}.card .card__description{font-size:24px}.card_size_m{grid-column:span 2}.card_size_s{grid-column:span 1}@media only screen and (max-width:1024px){@supports
